Dropbox Deduplication test

It works by breaking files into blocks. Each of these blocks is hashed. Only blocks that are not yet known are uploaded to the server when syncing.

Check : Dropbox blog

Test

I used this video for testing which is 21.8 MB in size. The freshly downloaded file took 27 seconds ( approx ) to sync. Then, I renamed the file. This duplicate file took 4 seconds( approx )!

Video
